sense.gloss: to meet, to encounter, to see
to have an accident, to have a bad experience
to meet (by chance), to come across, to run across, to encounter, to happen upon
to meet (e.g. of rivers, highways, etc.)
encountering, facing, being confronted with, coming upon
to make (someone) to meet, to let (someone) meet
to expose to, to subject to
to meet fortuitously (e.g. running into an old friend), to meet by chance, to happen across
clandestine meeting (of lovers), assignation, tryst, (lovers') rendezvous
a couple strangely but happily united, uncanny relationship formed by a quirk of fate
clandestine meeting (e.g. for lovers), rendezvous, tryst, secret meeting

sdata.j: ↑逢↑↓あ↓うは↑別↑↓わか↓れの↑始↑↓はじ↓め。
sdata.e: We never meet without a parting.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓がおまえを↑捨↑↓す↓てて↑英語↑↓えいご↓↑学校↑↓がっこう↓で↑出逢↑↓であ↓ったアメリカ↑人↑↓じん↓の↑男性↑↓だんせい↓に↑乗↑↓の↓り↑換↑↓か↓えたことを↑認↑↓みと↓めてはっきり↑言↑↓い↓ったらどうだい？
sdata.e: Why don't you just call a spade a spade and admit that she dumped you for that American guy she met at the English school?

sdata.j: ↑忘↑↓わす↓れないで↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に↑逢↑↓あ↓わなければならない。
sdata.e: I must remember to see her.

sdata.j: ↑友理子↑↓ゆりこ↓はたまの↑逢瀬↑↓おうせ↓を↑心行↑↓こころゆ↓くまで↑楽↑↓たの↓しんでしまいました。
sdata.e: Yuriko thoroughly enjoyed her occasional secret meetings with her lover.

sdata.j: この↑恋↑↓こい↓の↑莟↑↓つぼみ↓は↑皐月↑↓さつき↓の↑風↑↓かぜ↓に↑育↑↓そだ↓てられて、↑又↑↓また↓↑逢↑↓あ↓うまでには↑美↑↓うつく↓しゅう↑咲↑↓さ↓くであろう。
sdata.e: This bud of love, by summer’s ripening breath, may prove a beauteous flower when next we meet.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓たち↑二人↑↓ふたり↓はいつどこで↑出逢↑↓であ↓ったの？
sdata.e: When and where did you two meet?

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓と↑次↑↓つぎ↓に↑逢↑↓あ↓えるのはいつだろう。
sdata.e: I wonder when the next time I meet her will be.

sdata.j: ↑逢↑↓あ↓いたくて↑仕方↑↓しかた↓がないんだ。
↑逢↑↓あ↓いたくて↑仕方↑↓しかた↓がないんだ。
sdata.e: I can't wait to see you.

sdata.j: ↑逢↑↓あ↓いたくてたまらないんだ。

words.gloss: to meet, to encounter, to see
to meet (by chance), to come across, to run across, to encounter, to happen upon
